title: black screen
body: every time I start join a game so when entering champion select my client goes black and i can't do anything except close the client and dodge

replies.body:
Hey there,

Sorry this is happening, could I get you to [repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6) please and let me know if this helps or not so we can explore further possible causes of this issue.
well that fixed it for now but I had fixed it before by re-downloading and it came back
If the issue occurs again please make another thread and we'll be happy to help out.
